highlights: Hotfixes
Metadata support has arrived! Now you can view, edit, or modify your audio metadata within Vinylfy!
Check out our new metadata editor in the process audio section.
Note: Metadata editing is not supported in OGG and WAV formats.
improvements: More consistent spacing between cards on mobile and desktop views.
